text: Padanayakan is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film directed by Nissar and starring Vijayaraghavan and Dileep in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Vijayaraghavan *Dileep * KPAC Lalitha * Chippy as Sreedevi * Rajan P Dev * Kalabhavan Mani * Meera * Sainudeen as Karimoocha Kannappan * Baburaj as Pattanakadan * Tony * Machan Varghese * Mafia Sasi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Padanayakan
